name: Space Battles (Joking Vampire Studios)
description:
Space Battles!!!

Top down shooting reimagined. In space battles you are the red ship and you must survive the endless hordes off bosses and enemies that simply keep on increasing. Thankfully you have power ups and boosts to help you along your way but the question: how long can you survive?

And many maybe how many points you could get!! :)

Good luck and have fun!
